messages.undefined: An undefined message was loaded! This is an error and should be reported to the bot developer:
messages.support:
Found an issue while using the bot?
Found a translation error or a typo?
Need help using the bot in any way?
Please DM: Kaluub#1527.
messages.no_admin: This command requires admin permission from within the bot itself.
messages.new_language: Your language was set to English.
messages.no_pets: You don't have any pets! Try using `/claim` to get some.
messages.no_pets_with_name: There are no pets with that name!
messages.no_owned_pets_with_name: You don't own any pets with that name! Use `/pets` to see a list of your pets.
messages.successful_new_active_pet: You successfully changed your active pet to
messages.claim_cooldown: You are on claim cooldown, please wait 6 hours between claims!
messages.pet_no_value: This pet is not able to be sold for tokens directly!
messages.help_description:
This is a list of every command and what it will do, alongside it's syntax.
To learn more about a specific command, you should run `/help [command name]`
messages.no_command_with_name: There is no command registered with the name
messages.shop_description:
A list of every item you can buy and sell!
To buy an item, use `/buy [item name]`.
messages.source_description: If you want to see the source code of this bot, you can see (most) of it over at [GitHub](https://github.com/Kaluub/petbot).
messages.item_not_purchaseable: This item cannot be purchased from the shop.
messages.item_not_salable: This item cannot be sold to the shop.
messages.item_not_found: This item couldn't be found. A list of item names is available using `/shop`.
messages.item_limited: This item is no longer for sale!
messages.no_tokens: You don't have enough tokens to afford this item!
messages.no_stats: You have no stats! Use some functions of the bot more and stats will come.
messages.no_events: There are no ongoing events at the moment.

commands.locale: An admin tool for testing the locale features.
commands.claim: Claim a new pet. This can only be used every 6 hours.
commands.petadmin: An admin tool for managing pets.
commands.petinfo: Receive pet information for any pet.
commands.help: The help menu of the bot.
commands.sellpet: Used to sell pets for tokens.
commands.setactive: Sets a new active pet that gains EXP.
commands.settings: Customize some aspects of the bot to your liking.
commands.shop: Purchasing new items as well as selling old items is done through this command.
commands.source: View the source code of the bot on GitHub.
commands.use: This command is used for using any of your owned items.
commands.stats: View your personal statistics using this command.
commands.inventory: View the inventory of yourself or other.
commands.buy: This command is used for buying items from the shop.
commands.sell: This command is used for selling items to the shop.
commands.events: Used to see any active events and some details about them.

descriptions.clash_eye: The child of the eye, the true eyesore.
descriptions.lime: A lime that somewhat looks familiar. Exclusive to Kaluub.
descriptions.appreciation_star: An exclusive pet given to people who've supported the development of this bot.
descriptions.basic_egg: This egg might contain a kitten... or even a puppy? Let it reach level 10 to find out!
descriptions.basic_cat: A generic cat. Hatched from the Basic Egg.
descriptions.basic_dog: A generic dog. Hatched from the Basic Egg.
descriptions.drippy: This water droplet is still questioning whether it's wet or not.
descriptions.gushy: This droplet moved on from things it considered dumb. Probably made out of ketchup?
descriptions.pink_heart: A living, shining pink heart. Luckily not in the shape of the real deal.

valentines-2021.name: Valentines Event
valentines-2021.description:
The month of Valentines is here!
For this month only, you can find the **Pink Heart** pet from claiming, as well as the limited **Heart Locket** item from the shop.
Happy Valentines!

stpatricks-2021.name: St. Patricks Event
stpatricks-2021.description:
For the next 2 weeks, enjoy some St. Patricks related goods!
